titles.title: A bill for the relief of Spencer M. Hurtt, Junior and Annie Lawrie D. Hurtt.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 9/9/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to redetermine the tax liability of two named individuals for a specified period.
